title: Expert Video Editor (VSLs, Facebook Ads & Personal Branding Content)
salary: $200-$600 USD/month (negotiable based on skills/experience, starting with per-project or hourly arrangements)
job_overview:
We're seeking a highly skilled video editor specializing in creating compelling Video Sales Letters (VSLs), attention-grabbing Facebook/Instagram ads, and engaging personal brand videos (similar to Alex Hormozi or Iman Gadzhi style). You'll work closely with our marketing agency, Capital Connective, producing optimized videos designed to drive conversions, brand awareness, and personal influence.

Projects will initially be on a per-GIG basis with potential for steady hourly work or a consistent part-time role (approximately 3 hours daily). This position offers significant growth potential for the right candidate.

Key Responsibilities:

Edit engaging Video Sales Letters (1-2 minutes).

Produce optimized Facebook & Instagram ads (~30 seconds).

Edit dynamic personal brand videos for Instagram and YouTube.

Follow detailed editing instructions closely for each project.

Salary:
$200-$600 USD/month (negotiable based on skills/experience, starting with per-project or hourly arrangements)
